object.name: getMe
object.description: A simple method for testing your bot's authentication token. Requires no parameters. Returns basic information about the bot in form of a User object.
object.html_description: A simple method for testing your bot's authentication token. Requires no parameters. Returns basic information about the bot in form of a User object.
object.rst_description: A simple method for testing your bot's authentication token. Requires no parameters. Returns basic information about the bot in form of a :class:`aiogram.types.user.User` object.
